title: So um...no remake in ARAM?
body: I think a remake system should be implemented in ARAM...a lot of people disconnect or don't even connect in when the game starts. It's hard to win an ARAM when you're missing a person from the very start.

replies.body:
I think its because you have better luck at 4v5 than SR.

I've seen a lot of aram games won by 4v5.

ARAM is based on team fights. There's no picking off a stray adc in the bot lane. You need a 5th member regardless on what game mode you're playing.
Yeah, 4v5 Sr is instant lose, but Aram you can have a chance at winning. I agree with giving aram a remake tho.

I don't agree. It's not an automatic loss if it's 4v5 Summoner's Rift. It's just much much harder without having that extra teammate from the start. Summoner's Rift there are more towers to take, Dragons/Barons to secure, a bigger map in general.
I'm guessing a lot of these 4v5 victories are because the teams already had an advantage due to RNG.
Nailed it. You win the 4v5s you would have stomped as 5.
You have a clear advantage in XP though.

> ARAM is based on team fights. There's no picking off a stray adc in the bot lane. You need a 5th member regardless on what game mode you're playing.

Quite not true, I only play ARAMS (check my history..) and there I see a lot more 4v5s taking place, with the 4 man team winning than I do see it in SR. Also, ARAM is heavily inclined towards better comps BUT after that, the deciding factor is whoever pokes the other team better, hence why you can win 4v5s, because you can either, have a better comp despite being outnumbered OR just by out playing them. In SR it's a lot harder because there's more to do around the map, and 4v5 is almost impossible to win. In SR you have to keep sight of where the minions are pushing, drake, baron, buffs. 3 lanes, 2 main objectives.. lots of bushes etc. So being short on one is a lot worst in SR than it is in ARAM

But there is no point in comparing to SR because the subject is REMAKES IN ARAM, are we talking about Twisted Treeline ? No, cause that's not the point. And moreover, if you really still wanna compare to SR, in SR you CHOOSE your champ, not in ARAM, u get stupid randoms that most of the time do not help the comp for teamfights at all. Rerolls should be 1 per games, that makes 5 possible rerolls if teamates help in which can "possibly" help getting some CC when u get a shity comp. It is just to unpredictable, and only pros can pull of some stunts with a useless comp with an Ivern,/Sona/Yuumi/Soraka/Lulu cause ur rerolls we all burned. You could argue there's plenty to do with that comp but NO, anything else on the other side will crush that comp, let alone their experience with the champs they didn't not choose. After one single ARAM game, you can easily burn your 2 rerolls to try to get a decent team comp and then your fked for the rest of the day. Worst, you burn your 2 rerolls to get a decent comp then you might've quite possibly burned your 2 rerolls for a guy that will afk/dc the game anywayss So this ARAM mode lacks serious 'BALANCE'. BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE BALANCE  hopefully I'll make someone sick at Rito for seeing the fkin word BALANCE, they must be sending their workforce to therapy every once in a while to manage this word in their life when they see/read it pfff   Anyways, I guess the lesson here is ARAM is for mindless noobs and is meant for mindless noobs only, those guys that have very little knowledge of the game, not all of us are LCS pros to win a 4v5 with a support comp Just shut up and dance

Depends HEAVILY on what 4 those are, vs what 5. If it's five immobile champs and one of the 4 is Veigar, for instance, I totally agree that 4 can beat 5.

But I don't want my games to be even MORE at the mercy of RNGeesus than they already are. Remake needs to be a thing in ARAM.
Finally, somebody noticed. It was about time a post like this was made. Also we need 15 min ff in aram xd
What? Thers already 15 minute ff tho.
We need 10 minutes, 15 is too long for ARAM. Especially with afk's.

what aram really really needs is an no contest rule - > if a team is ever up by 15 kills the match should end immediately , no w/l count , timebased loss ip for both teams , +150 pt reroll charge  .

ive had matches on the winning side so bad i could not enjoy it , by like 8 minutes . And ive been in plenty of no contests wondering why the F we are still here .
That would be incredibly easy to abuse. An angry player throwing themselves repeatedly to the enemy team just so that they could get to the next game with a better set of champs faster.
Agreed. Also annoying playing nexus siege as there is NO remake system at all. Its pretty much a waiting to loose simulator. Remake should be in ALL gamemodes

In ARAM it wont work, the system is more exploitable than SR. Bad team comp, let me get out and remake. The other team got a better team, Same. Got a champ I hate, ill do it again. The point of ARAM is being able to handle everything, no matter what, adaptability is key in the mode, if we add a remake, ARAM loses what makes it a fun mode, cause everyone will dodge or remake.
ARAM is different from summoner's rift though. As soon as someone gets a champion they don't like or don't want to play they'll just afk and ARAM games will always become remakes.

I prefer to sit through several remakes than have 20+ minutes of my life wasted because of an AFK/DC player.

And no, the match will not end quickly because you always get the Schadenfreude Player who delays the match and watches you suffer.
I doubt anyone would afk. And the explanation is simple. If they get a bad champ they dodge because dodging doesn't give you as big of a penalty as afking does

I mean, youre right that it needs to happen. but 4 v5 aram is more winable than 4 v 5 sr. 
its because of shared xp, a team with less present members will/(could) out-level the other team(especially if they focus on getting aces rather than kills) 
of course once the other team hits 18 youre sol.
tbh the best way to win a 4 v 5 that your team is struggling against is to have their weakest member afk by nexus until later, theyll still gain gold and some xp without siphoning xp from their team. then theyll just have to massively level for one team fight, and then they can help their team sweep the next.
of course...this is also aram and nobody would think this through that hard
I AGREE ME AND MY BFF SAID THE SAME THING!
I 100% support this. I play a lot of Aram, and nearly every game I play, there is an afker. I have won games 4v5, due to having a level advantage, but those games are rare at best.

I'm not opposed to adding the remake system to ARAM--I've definitely lost games when a teammate never connected.  I will say, though, that I've also won ARAM games despite a teammate never connecting, and I've lost ARAM games to teams who were down a player.  The games are typically so quick that it doesn't feel quite so bad to lose due to an AFK.
